definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton

sentences.english: He dabbed the wound on her arm gently with cotton wool.
sentences.chinese: 他用藥棉輕擦她胳膊上的傷口。

sentences.english: She needed some cotton wool to treat her wound.
sentences.chinese: 她需要一些藥棉來處理傷口。

sentences.english: Do you need some absorbent cotton?
sentences.chinese: 您是否需要一些藥棉呢？

sentences.english: I tried to say something，but my mouth was full of cotton wool.
sentences.chinese: 我想說句話，但我嘴裏塞滿了藥棉。

sentences.english: Luckily I had brought with me in my toilet bag a quantity of cotton wool.
sentences.chinese: 很走運，我在化妝包裏帶了一些藥棉。

sentences.english: "I removed them all, "the doctor declared. "We'll close now. "
sentences.chinese: 我把所有的藥棉都取出了，我們現在可以收工了。

sentences.english: When the dentist at last removed the cotton wool from my mouth.
sentences.chinese: 當那位牙醫最後將藥棉從我嘴中取出時。

sentences.english: I tried to say something， but my mouth was full of cotton wool.
sentences.chinese: 我想說點什麼，但我嘴裏塞滿了藥棉。
